short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Downloads all open image-only tabs into a configured subfolder with user-defined prefix, etc.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Download Image Tabs is a fully open-source Chrome extension that makes it easy to save images directly from your open tabs. It’s designed for users who often work with reference images or want a more streamlined way to organize and store visual content. 

Key features include:
• Quickly download all images from open image-only tabs
• Add a custom filename prefix for better organization
• Save files into a specified subfolder in your Downloads folder
• Set an optional maximum file size to skip overly large images
• Option to automatically close tabs after downloading to keep your browser tidy
• Fully open source: review and contribute to the code on GitHub
